entities.name: s na pe
entities.description: S NAPE is an event where Harry was miming the shattering of a nose to raucous laughter and applause.

entities.name: treacle tart
entities.description: Harry's treacle tart is mentioned as something he is eating.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is someone Harry wants to fight one on one.

entities.name: professor slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn wanted to know what really happened at the Ministry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is someone who was interrogated about Harry on the train.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is someone who was also interrogated about Harry on the train.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who considers himself an authority on Harry and has assured the spirit community that he will not pester Harry for information.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the Chosen One and is being talked about by many people.

relationships.description: Harry wants to fight Malfoy one on one.
Professor Slughorn wanted to know what really happened at the Ministry.
Hermione was interrogated about Harry on the train.
Ron was also interrogated about Harry on the train.
Nearly Headless Nick considers himself an authority on Harry and has assured the spirit community that he will not pester Harry for information.
Many people are talking about Harry.
